mapper.select: SELECT RNUM , OJT_BOARD_NO , OJT_BOARD_CATEGORY , OJT_BOARD_TITLE , OJT_BOARD_CONTENT , OJT_BOARD_RECOMMEND , OJT_BOARD_LAST_DATE , OJT_BOARD_HIT , TO_CHAR(OJT_BOARD_LAST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , LAST_DATE , OJT_BOARD_BLOCK , OJT_BOARD_IMPORT , MEM_ID , OJT_BOARD_NICK , OJT_BOARD_NICK_PW , OJT_BOARD_DEL_PLUG, MEM_NAME, COUNT_FILE FROM ( SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS RNUM , OJT_BOARD_NO , OJT_BOARD_CATEGORY , OJT_BOARD_TITLE , OJT_BOARD_CONTENT , OJT_BOARD_RECOMMEND , OJT_BOARD_LAST_DATE , OJT_BOARD_HIT , TO_CHAR(OJT_BOARD_LAST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , LAST_DATE , OJT_BOARD_BLOCK , OJT_BOARD_IMPORT , MEM_ID , OJT_BOARD_NICK , OJT_BOARD_NICK_PW , OJT_BOARD_DEL_PLUG, MEM_NAME, COUNT_FILE FROM ( SELECT OJT_BOARD_NO , OJT_BOARD_CATEGORY , OJT_BOARD_TITLE , OJT_BOARD_CONTENT , OJT_BOARD_RECOMMEND , OJT_BOARD_LAST_DATE , OJT_BOARD_HIT , TO_CHAR(OJT_BOARD_LAST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , LAST_DATE , OJT_BOARD_BLOCK , OJT_BOARD_IMPORT , MEM_ID , OJT_BOARD_NICK , OJT_BOARD_NICK_PW , OJT_BOARD_DEL_PLUG, MEM_NAME, COUNT_FILE FROM ( SELECT OJT_BOARD.OJT_BOARD_NO , OJT_BOARD_CATEGORY , OJT_BOARD_TITLE , OJT_BOARD_CONTENT , OJT_BOARD_RECOMMEND , OJT_BOARD_LAST_DATE , OJT_BOARD_HIT , TO_CHAR(OJT_BOARD_LAST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') , CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(OJT_BOARD_LAST_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') THEN TO_CHAR(OJT_BOARD_LAST_DATE, 'HH24:MI:SS') ELSE TO_CHAR(OJT_BOARD_LAST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') END AS LAST_DATE , OJT_BOARD_BLOCK , OJT_BOARD_IMPORT , OJT_BOARD.MEM_ID , OJT_BOARD.OJT_BOARD_NICK , OJT_BOARD_NICK_PW , OJT_BOARD_DEL_PLUG, MEMBER.MEM_NAME, COUNT(OJT_FILE.FILE_NO) AS COUNT_FILE FROM OJT_BOARD LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER ON OJT_BOARD.MEM_ID = MEMBER.MEM_ID INNER JOIN OJT_FILE ON OJT_BOARD.OJT_BOARD_NO = OJT_FILE.OJT_BOARD_NO WHERE OJT_BOARD_DEL_PLUG = 'Y' GROUP BY OJT_BOARD.OJT_BOARD_NO, MEMBER.MEM_NAME ) B ORDER BY OJT_BOARD_LAST_DATE ) Bo ) Bob ORDER BY RNUM DESC LIMIT #{pageCount} OFFSET #{offSet}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM OJT_BOARD WHERE OJT_BOARD_DEL_PLUG = 'Y'
